column4: Hello, I need some help,  how do I empty the trashbin?  there's no shortcut for it in the menus
create a new launcher on the desktop.
I mean, I know how to make a launcher, but I dont know what command to use
ok. on the desktop, right click and create launcher.. Type "Location"
then in Location, key in "trash:///" without the quotes
yep.. try it now and see if it works
it will also work if you dragged the launcher to your panel.. just in case, like me, your Trans icon in the panel mysteriously disappeared
you sure you have trash:/// as the Location?
and the Launcher Type is "Location" right?
oh, sorry,  didnt see that I could change that  ;)
there,  it works now, thanks a ot for the help mate
